  1. 325-329

    30.11.2011

    Probably my least favourite week of the project so far. I just didn't get the pictures I wanted, which, it appears, can knock my confidence and frustrate me.

  2. 324: Lickey Hills

    23.11.2011

    Setting aside the whole day for walking around taking photos is awesome, and it's normally when I end up getting some of my favourite shots. It turns out the Lickey Hills looks pretty good in fog.
